𓄝 is usually transcribed as #st and has the following usages:
𓋴 𓄝 𓏏 𓏏 𓁐 Satis (goddess) S+𓄝+t+t(h)
𓋴 𓄝 𓏏 𓌕 𓂡 shoot s+𓄝+t
𓋴 𓄝 𓏏 𓊮 set (fire) s+𓄝+t
𓋴 𓄜 𓏏 𓃒 schüttern, stained (dabbled)
𓋴 𓄝 𓅂 𓌙 𓀀 aSiat
𓄝 𓏏 𓏏 𓐎 𓏥 shooting pains
𓄝 𓏏 𓏏 𓈇 𓏤 ground : Schotter stones 𓊌
𓄝 𓏏 𓁹 stare : “st+t+eye{ir}”
𓄝 𓏏 𓇋 𓇋 𓈗 pour (water) : “shty” schütt, shed
𓅱 𓋴 𓈙 𓏏 𓈗 urine : 1. wasshed ⇔ water 2. us-shit (aus-scheid / aus-schütten)
𓈗 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓈗 urine שֶׁתֶ schütten => 𓈗=sea? 𓈗=𓅱𓋴𓈙 Wasser w.s.sh'
𓋴 𓄞 𓂧 𓍼 sheath: Scheide
𓄞 𓂧 𓊌 vulva: Scheide
…
